Welcome to Claude Code
━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
Version: 1.0.0
Environment: VS Code Extension Host

Claude Code is ready to assist you with:
  • Code generation and modification
  • File operations and refactoring
  • Terminal command execution
  • Project analysis and understanding

Type your request or use @file mentions to reference code.

>
